text: Nashua is a city in Iowa in the United States. As of the 2020 census, the city had 1,551 people. This was an decrease of 112, or 6.7%, from the 1,663 people reported at the 2010 census. The famed Little Brown Church featured in the song "The Church in the Wildwood" is located in Nashua. ==Geography== Nashua is located at (42.952231, -92.537944). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of , of which, of it is land and is water. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Nashua * Nashua-Plainfield Schools * City-Data Comprehensive Statistical Data and more about Nashua Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Nashua, Iowa
